content.text:
# 2011 My AOD Favourites Awards

| next = 2012
}}
The 2011 My AOD Favourites Awards (), presented by Astro in Malaysia, was an awards ceremony that recognised the best Hong Kong TVB television drama series that had aired on Malaysia's Astro On Demand (AOD) in 2011.
The ceremony took place on 27 November 2011 at the Suria KLCC in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. Astro first broadcast the award show on AOD on 3 December 2011 at 20:30 MST.
Winners and nominees
Top five nominees are in bold.
{| class="wikitable"
|-
! style="width:50%;"| My Favourite Drama Series
! style="width:50%;"|
|-
| valign="top"|
* Ghetto Justice
** The Other Truth
** Lives of Omission
** Men with No Shadows
** Forensic Heroes III
** Gun Metal Grey
** The Rippling Blossom
** Yes, Sir. Sorry, Sir!
** The Life and Times of a Sentinel
** River of Wine
** Super Snoops
** Curse of the Royal Harem

* Kenneth Ma as Fuk-tsuen, the Prince Yu in The Life and Times of a Sentinel
* Michael Tse as "Laughing" Leung Siu-tong in Lives of Omission

* Bosco Wong as Michael So in Lives of Omission
